text: Alexys Nycole Sanchez (born June 29, 2003) is an American actress, best known for her role as Becky Feder in the 2010 comedy film Grown Ups and the sequel Grown Ups 2 (2013). In the 2011 MTV Movie Awards she won the award for Best Line for Grown ups and Grown ups 2. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {|class=wikitable !Year!!Title!!Role!!Notes |- |2010||Grown Ups||Becky Feder|| |- |2013||Grown Ups 2||Becky Feder|| |} ==Awards and nominations== {| class="wikitable" |- !
